channel.title: Wolf Parade
channel.description:
Wolf Parade is/was an indie rock band from Montreal. I've been listening to them a lot the past few months, and just found out they are good friends with my brother. If you like synthesizers, this band is for you :)
The singer's voice takes a bit of time to adjust to. But it's absolutely awesome music!
Sons and Daughters of Hungry Ghosts (skip to 20 seconds in for the song to start) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G3f0U9IPOb4&fmt=18
Disco Sheets http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K_SYc6V6dFo&fmt=18
I'll believe in anything http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=df91aCyNMPo&fmt=18
They have a lot better songs that I can't find on youtube. Download their albums if you like it.
